title: Performance-Based CAD/CAM Foundation Training Course for Large-Scale Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mechanical Engineering and Computer Literacy Skills
context.additional_context: Non-real-time online environment providing digital devices (e.g., laptops) for CAD/CAM software practice and collaborative learning, with job-linked projects tailored to job seekers' characteristics

learning_goals: Learners understand basic CAD/CAM concepts and can design simple mechanical parts using 3D modeling tools
Learners can generate NC machining codes and perform machining simulations using CAM software
Learners can set personalized learning goals according to a performance-based assessment system and complete practical projects
Learners can cultivate problem-solving skills required in industrial settings through team-based collaborative tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
